attributes.additional_details: I will be happy to supply signatures of fellow members of the town that hold the same feelings and would very much appreciate our concerns. We only ask of this as we feel the end result would drive our town and create new jobs and enhance the area as a whole.
attributes.background: Over the past few years myself and hundreds of other residents of Sale have noticed a drastic decline in the areas appearance and lack of diversity in shopping and eateries. The area is over populated with bookmakers, charity shops, coffee shops etc with no modern movement.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
